description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for an Amazon EFS file system is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EFS file system location that you want information about.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon EFS file system location.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URL of the Amazon EFS file system location.

nested_items.name: Ec2Config
nested_items.description: The subnet and security groups that DataSync uses to connect to one of your Amazon EFS file system's mount targets.

nested_items.name: SubnetArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of a subnet where DataSync creates the network interfaces for managing traffic during your transfer.
In the same virtual private cloud (VPC) as the Amazon EFS file system.
In the same Availability Zone as at least one mount target for the Amazon EFS file system.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupArns
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups associated with an Amazon EFS file system's mount target.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the location was created.

nested_items.name: AccessPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the access point that DataSync uses to access the Amazon EFS file system.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows DataSync to access your Amazon EFS file system.

nested_items.name: InTransitEncryption
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DataSync uses Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption when transferring data to or from the Amazon EFS file system.
